item.text: “‘You must not make for yourselves idols, so you must not set up for yourselves a carved image or a pillar, and you must not place a sculpted stone in your land to bow down before it, for I am the Lord your God.
You must keep my Sabbaths and reverence my sanctuary. I am the Lord.
“‘If you walk in my statutes and are sure to obey my commandments,

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you your <st data-num="01653" class="">rains</st> in their <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> so that<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> its <st data-num="02981" class="">yield</st> and the <st data-num="06086" class="">trees</st> of the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> will <st data-num="05414" class="">produce</st> their <st data-num="06529" class="">fruit</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01786" class="">Threshing season</st> will <st data-num="05381" class="">extend</st> for you <st data-num="05381" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="01210" class="">season for harvesting grapes</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="01210" class="">season for harvesting grapes</st> will <st data-num="05381" class="">extend until</st> <st data-num="02233" class="">sowing season</st>, so<n id="2" /> you will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> your <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> until you are <st data-num="07648" class="">satisfied</st>,<n id="3" /> and you will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0983" class="">securely</st> in your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> so that<n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="07901" class="">lie down to sleep</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> anyone <st data-num="02729" class="">terrifying</st> you.<n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="07673" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">harmful</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">animals</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, and <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> of war<n id="4" /> will <st data-num="05674" class="">pass through</st> your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

You will <st data-num="07291" class="">pursue</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>, and they will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="02568" class="">Five</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> you will <st data-num="07291" class="">pursue</st> a <st data-num="03967" class="">hundred</st>, and a <st data-num="03967" class="">hundred</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> you will <st data-num="07291" class="">pursue</st> <st data-num="07233" class="">ten thousand</st>, and your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.

I will <st data-num="06437" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, <st data-num="06509" class="">make</st> you <st data-num="06509" class="">fruitful</st>, <st data-num="07235" class="">multiply</st> you, and <st data-num="06965" class="">maintain</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you.
You will still be eating stored produce from the previous year and will have to clean out what is stored from the previous year to make room for new.
“‘I will put my tabernacle in your midst, and I will not abhor you.

I will <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> you, and I will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
I am the Lord your God who brought you out from the land of Egypt, from being their slaves, and I broke the bars of your yoke and caused you to walk upright.
“‘If, however, you do not obey me and keep all these commandments—

<st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="03988" class="">reject</st> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st> and <st data-num="01602 05315">abhor</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> so that you do <st data-num="01115" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">keep</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> my <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st> and you <st data-num="06565" class="">break</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st>—

I <st data-num="0637" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">my</st> <st data-num="0637" class="">part</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> to you: I will <st data-num="06485" class="">inflict</st> <st data-num="0928" class="">horror</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> you, <st data-num="07829" class="">consumption</st> and <st data-num="06920" class="">fever</st>, which <st data-num="03615" class="">diminish</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">eyesight</st> and <st data-num="01727" class="">drain away</st> the <st data-num="05315" class="">vitality of life</st>.<n id="2" /> You will <st data-num="02232" class="">sow</st> your <st data-num="02233" class="">seed</st> in <st data-num="07385" class="">vain</st> because<n id="3" /> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> it.<n id="4" />
I will set my face against you. You will be struck down before your enemies; those who hate you will rule over you, and you will flee when there is no one pursuing you.
“‘If, in spite of all these things, you do not obey me, I will discipline you seven times more on account of your sins.

I will <st data-num="07665" class="">break</st> your <st data-num="05797" class="">strong</st> <st data-num="01347" class="">pride</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> your <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> like <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st> and your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> like <st data-num="05154" class="">bronze</st>.
Your strength will be used up in vain; your land will not give its yield, and the trees of the land will not produce their fruit.
“‘If you walk in hostility against me and are not willing to obey me, I will increase your affliction seven times according to your sins.
I will send the wild animals against you, and they will bereave you of your children, annihilate your cattle, and diminish your population so that your roads will become deserted.
“‘If in spite of these things you do not allow yourselves to be disciplined and you walk in hostility against me,

then I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> will <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> in <st data-num="07147" class="">hostility</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> you and <st data-num="05221" class="">strike</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven times</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on account of</st> your <st data-num="02403" class="">sins</st>.

I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> you an <st data-num="05358" class="">avenging</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, a <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="05359" class="">vengeance</st>.<n id="1" /> Although<n id="2" /> you will <st data-num="0622" class="">gather together</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> your <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>, I will <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> <st data-num="01698" class="">pestilence</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> you, and you will be <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> into <st data-num="0341" class="">enemy</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>.<n id="3" />
When I break off your supply of bread, ten women will bake your bread in one oven; they will ration your bread by weight, and you will eat and not be satisfied.
“‘If in spite of this you do not obey me but walk in hostility against me,

I will <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> in <st data-num="07147" class="">hostile</st> <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> you,<n id="1" /> and I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> will <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03256" class="">discipline</st> you <st data-num="07651" class="">seven times</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on account of</st> your <st data-num="02403" class="">sins</st>.

You will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> of your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and the <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> of your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="08045" class="">destroy</st> your <st data-num="01116" class="">high places</st> and <st data-num="03772" class="">cut down</st> your <st data-num="02553" class="">incense altars</st>,<n id="1" /> and I will <st data-num="05414" class="">stack</st> your <st data-num="06297" class="">dead bodies</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on top of</st> the <st data-num="06297">lifeless bodies</st> of your <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05315" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01602" class="">abhor</st> you.<n id="3" />

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">lay</st> your <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="02723" class="">waste</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="08074" class="">make</st> your <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuaries</st> <st data-num="08074" class="">desolate</st>, and I will <st data-num="03808" class="">refuse</st> to <st data-num="07306" class="">smell</st> your <st data-num="05207" class="">soothing</st> <st data-num="07381" class="">aromas</st>.

I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> will <st data-num="08074" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="08074" class="">desolate</st>, and your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in it will <st data-num="08074" class="">be appalled</st>.
I will scatter you among the nations and unsheathe the sword after you, so your land will become desolate and your cities will become a waste.
“‘Then the land will make up for its Sabbaths all the days it lies desolate while you are in the land of your enemies; then the land will rest and make up its Sabbaths.
All the days of the desolation it will have the rest it did not have on your Sabbaths when you lived on it.

“‘As for the ones who remain among you, I will bring despair into their hearts in the lands of their enemies. The sound of a blowing leaf will pursue them, and they will flee as one who flees the sword and will fall down even though there is no pursuer.

They will <st data-num="03782" class="">stumble</st> over <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">other</st> as those who flee <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> a <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, though<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">pursuer</st>, and there will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> one to take a <st data-num="08617" class="">stand</st><n id="2" /> for you <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>.
You will perish among the nations; the land of your enemies will consume you.

“‘As for the ones who remain among you, they will rot away because of their iniquity in the lands of your enemies, and they will also rot away because of their ancestors’ iniquities which are with them.

However, when<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="03034" class="">confess</st> their <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st> and their <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors’</st> <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquities</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> they <st data-num="04604" class="">committed</st> by <st data-num="04604" class="">trespassing</st> against me,<n id="2" /> by <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> they <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">walked</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="07147" class="">hostility</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> me<n id="4" />

(<st data-num="0637" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> will <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> in <st data-num="07147" class="">hostility</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> them and <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them into the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of their <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>), <st data-num="0176" class="">and</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0227" class="">then</st> their <st data-num="06189" class="">uncircumcised</st> <st data-num="03824" class="">hearts</st> become <st data-num="03665" class="">humbled</st> and they <st data-num="07521" class="">make up for</st><n id="2" /> their <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquities</st>,

I will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> and <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st> and <st data-num="0637" class="">also</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st>,<n id="1" /> and I will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will be <st data-num="05800" class="">abandoned</st> by <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st><n id="1" /> in order that it may <st data-num="07521" class="">make up for</st><n id="2" /> its <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st> while it is <st data-num="08074" class="">made desolate</st><n id="3" /> without <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>,<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="07521" class="">make up for</st> their <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st> <st data-num="03282 03282">because</st><n id="5" /> they have <st data-num="03988" class="">rejected</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> and have <st data-num="01602" class="">abhorred</st><n id="6" /> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st>.

In spite of this, however, when they are in the land of their enemies, I will not reject them and abhor them to make a complete end of them, to break my covenant with them, for I am the Lord their God.
I will remember for them the covenant with their ancestors whom I brought out from the land of Egypt in the sight of the nations to be their God. I am the Lord.’”
These are the statutes, regulations, and instructions which the Lord established between himself and the Israelites at Mount Sinai through Moses.
